content: this legal document explains the progress of a divorce case between mr bj and mrs ld the couple has agreed to settle their matrimonial rights and has divided their assets including furniture vehicles bank balances social rights and insurance policies they have also agreed on the division of their properties with mr bj receiving garages and mrs ld receiving a dwelling house they have settled their future assets and liabilities renounced any matrimonial benefits and agreed that each party will be responsible for their own finances the document also addresses arrangements for the custody and residence of their child mr jj and states that both parties waive their right to claim spousal support mrs ld agrees to make a onetime payment to mr jjs account the costs of the divorce proceedings will be paid by mrs ld except for lawyers fees the document also includes agreements related to inheritance tax and specifies when these agreements will become legally binding the text concludes by mentioning a sional application con and describes the parties decision to abandon the divorce proceedings and terminate the agreements made the document also mentions the election of domicile and the capacity of the parties involved as well as a power of attorney given by mrs ld to mr bj
